title: I have a midterm worth 30% of my final grade tomorrow, and I can't bring myself to study.
body: I am here. on GD, procrastinating. I have a question sheet, and an answer sheet that is like a mini review... I am going to do that... but there is like a good 4 hours of extra content... do I spend 30 minutes on it and play league until 1am? or do I put my nose to the grindstone and dig through the dreary, hard to decipher, additional material?
